word_means: 相联系，相互联系，相互连接

means: (使类似的事物)相联系，相互联系，相互连接

example.ex: The causes are many and may interconnect...
example.tran: 原因有很多而且可能互相关联。

example.ex: Their lives interconnect with those of celebrated figures of the late eighteenth-century...
example.tran: 他们的生活与18世纪晚期的名人联系在一起。

example.ex: The regions are interconnected by an excellent highway system.
example.tran: 那些地区通过完善的公路系统相互连接。

example.ex: ...a dense network of nerve fibres that interconnects neurons in the brain.
example.tran: 使大脑内部神经元相互连接的密集的神经纤维网络

value.def: Things that interconnect or are interconnected are connected to or with each other. You can also say that one thing interconnects with another.
